item.title: CVE-2023-37874|2024-08-02T17:23:27.678Z -- dimitar%20ivanov -- http%20headers
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dimitar Ivanov HTTP Headers plugin <= 1.18.11 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-37978|2024-08-02T17:23:27.828Z -- dimitar%20ivanov -- http%20headers
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Dimitar Ivanov HTTP Headers.This issue affects HTTP Headers: from n/a through 1.18.11.
